patient_info: Muscle weakness,Slurred speech,Abnormality of the liver,Splenomegaly,Hyperhomocystinemia,Drooling,Incoordination,Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology,Microscopic hematuria,Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration,Increased circulating ferritin concentration,Involuntary movements,Increased body weight,Abnormality of vitamin B12 metabolism,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Increased urinary copper concentration,Hand muscle weakness,Kayser-Fleischer ring,Abnormality of the maxillary sinus
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Wilson's Disease
2. Metabolic disorders (e.g., Maple Syrup Urine Disease, Propionic Acidemia)
3. Cerebellar degeneration (e.g., Spinocerebellar ataxia, Friedreich's ataxia)
4. Mitochondrial disorders (e.g., Kearns-Sayre Syndrome, MELAS)
5. Neuromuscular junction disorders (e.g., Myasthenia gravis, Lambert-Eaton Syndrome)
6. Metabolic myopathies (e.g., McArdle's disease, Carnitine palmitoyltransferase II deficiency)
7. Inflammatory neuropathies (e.g., Guillain-Barré Syndrome, Chronic Inflammatory Demyelinating Polyneuropathy)
8. Infectious causes (e.g., Progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy, Rabies)
9. Degenerative brain disorders (e.g., Alzheimer's disease, Parkinson's disease)
10. Syndromic disorders (e.g., Cockayne Syndrome, Canavan disease)

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further evaluation and testing will be necessary to narrow down the diagnosis. Early consultation with a multidisciplinary team, including a neurologist, geneticist, and metabolic specialist, would be beneficial.
